授業目的:
By introducing the basic English functions and grammar required at the beginner level, we aim to develop the ability to use English in daily life, including simple conversation and writing.
To be able to speak basic things in English with others by understanding simple conversations in natural English and being able to use expressions in everyday life.
到達目標:
In Listening and Speaking, students learn the basics of communication strategies used by native English speakers through classes that focus on pair and group work, including role-playing, research, singing, and games.
In addition to training in listening and speaking, proficiency in beginner English writing patterns will enable students to write English easily and effectively.
授業方法:
Coarse format:
Activities will include discussions, games, along with online activities. Students will work in pairs, groups, and individually.

Introducing the basic grammar, vocabulary, and language functions needed at an elementary level to be enable students to both understand, and take part in, short conversations based on sharing information on themselves, their families, interests, and school life.
